DOC.brief_summary: High mobility group 1 ( HMGB1 ) protein nuclear factor secrete protein , recently identify cytokine mediator systemic inflammation . HMGB1 release inflammatory cell actively , increase cell death passively mediate inflammatory response . It report association prognosis acute coronary syndrome , ischemia-reperfusion injury myocardium , atherosclerosis heart failure . This study aim investigate relationship serum level HMGB1 post operative prognosis patient undergone off-pump coronary artery bypass graft .
DOC.brief_title: Role High Mobility Group Box 1 Prognostic Biomarker Patients Undergoing Off-pump Coronary Artery Bypass Graft
